original_text: They live among the highest rocks. That is where they stay at night. They are safe on the sharp rocks. They live among the highest rocks. That is where they stay at night. They are safe on the sharp rocks. They live among the highest rocks. That is where they stay at night. They are safe on the sharp rocks. They live among the highest rocks. That is where they stay at night. They are safe on the sharp rocks. They live among the highest rocks.
korean_text: 그것이 낭떠러지에 집을 지으며 뾰족한 바위 끝이나 험준한 데 살며

sentences.original_text: They live among the highest rocks
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 가장 높은 바위들 사이에 살고
